text: Silana was a town in the Histiaeotis in the northwest of ancient Thessaly, near the frontiers of Athamania, mentioned along with Gomphi and Tricca by Livy. Its site remains unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Histiaeotis Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Silana (Thessaly)
